channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Job submission for the portable Flink runner is broken with 1.5.0 client running against 1.5.1 cluster. The older rest client fails to find the blob server. That client side code was removed in 1.5.1 client (whoo-hoo, Flink release patch compatibility anyone?). After upgrade the job submission is successful (but make sure to run ./gradlew :beam-runners-flink_2.11-job-server:clean first).

flink-runner-job-server] INFO org.apache.flink.client.program.rest.RestClusterClient - Submitting job e3aa468ef54117b6d59415c5cf7d444d (detached: false).
[flink-runner-job-server] INFO org.apache.flink.client.program.rest.RestClusterClient - Requesting blob server port.
[flink-runner-job-server] DEBUG org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.RestClient - Sending request of class class org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.messages.EmptyRequestBody to localhost:8081/blobserver/port
[flink-runner-job-server] DEBUG org.apache.flink.shaded.netty4.io.netty.util.ResourceLeakDetector - -Dorg.apache.flink.shaded.netty4.io.netty.leakDetectionLevel: simple
[flink-runner-job-server] DEBUG org.apache.flink.shaded.netty4.io.netty.util.internal.ThreadLocalRandom - -Dio.netty.initialSeedUniquifier: 0xfb0ac37ff3779711 (took 1 ms)

[flink-rest-client-netty-1-1] ERROR org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.RestClient - Unexpected plain-text response: Failure: 404 Not Found

We will do another update to Flink 1.5.2 client once that is available. It will need to be tested with submission to remote cluster. There will hopefully not be any incompatible changes again so that it can talk to 1.5.1 job manager.

Thread regarding REST API backward compatibility:

https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/31fd79a1414777caa97adb1fbae64a4163d8425ee47c6b99ed4b73ce@%3Cdev.flink.apache.org%3E
